DOC.brief_summary: The present study will examine whether serum FGF-23 and serum phosphate at baseline of kidney transplant recipients can predict progression of allograft dysfunction at 3 years and all-cause mortality at 5 years.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Fibroblast Growth Factor 23 (FGF-23) and Serum Phosphate on Allograft Function and Mortality in Kidney Allograft Recipients
DOC.criteria: at least one year posttransplantation no more than 10% increase in serum creatinine for the past 3 months refuse to participate in the study any acute illnesses
